"A.D.2028/3/30/14:00": "I give up. There's no meaning to continue this fight. This Irregular's pushing pass my break-even point."
"After coming this far, you're giving up!?"
"That's right, young lady. What I wanted was business. Sometimes, you have to leave your courage behind."
"I'll leave, for now. But, I won't forget you. Hitsugi Yasaka, and <%me>."
"The next time we meet... It won't be about \"Mother\", nor business, I'll crush you. I won't refrain from anything!"
"1. Overdoing is dangerous."
"2. We have something more important right now."
"...You're right. If you force yourself, anything could happen."
"..! Kohri!"
"...Hitsugi, you're lying right? You betraying us, is definitely a lie right, Hitsugi."
"I trusted you Hitsugi. That you didn't fight at all. But- but..!"
"Kohri... I didn't betray-"
"Then why! Why did you go against Mother's words! Why!? Why, Hitsugi!"
"Come back Hitsugi! Take my hand... And stay by my side!"
"...Kohri. Sorry, I can't go back anymore."
"What's right, and what's wrong. From what I've seen, I've already made up my mind... I'm going with <%me>."
"Wai- Wait, Hitsugi!"
"Sorry Kohri... I'm really sorry."
"Wait, Hitsugi!! HITSUGI!!!"
"Urgh... Uuurgh... Uurgh... Hitsugi, Hitsugi... Why... WHY!"
"We promised, that we'll always be together... Why, Hitsugi... WHY!"
"Kohri Washinomiya. Why are you crying?"
"If you're weeping because you've been betrayed... If you're sad because you lost someone... Then tighten your fists and strengthen your resolve."
"Bring your friend back with your own hands."
"...Hitsugi."
"I know, what you wish for."
"-Illusion Dimension-"
"幻創の現実"
